General.Name: Farglory FTZ Investment Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Farglory Free Trade Zone Investment Holding Co., Ltd., an investment holding company, provides free trade zone and logistics services in Taiwan. It offers air cargo, air container, and cargo tray devanning, untraying, and unloading services. The company also engages in the warehouse business; and leasing plants, offices, and warehouses. Farglory Free Trade Zone Investment Holding Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
